issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Post YARN-6736, RM support writing into ats v1 and v2 by new configuration setting _yarn.timeline-service.versions_. 
 Couple of issues observed in deployment are
 # TimelineClientImpl doesn't honor newly added configuration rather it still get version number from _yarn.timeline-service.version_. This causes not writing into v1.5 API's even though _yarn.timeline-service.versions has 1.5 value._ 
 # Similar line from 1st point, TimelineUtils#timelineServiceV1_5Enabled doesn't honor timeline-service.versions.
 # JobHistoryEventHandler#serviceInit(), line no 271 check for version number rather than calling YarnConfiguration#timelineServiceV2Enabled

cc :/ [~agresch]

This message was automatically generated.
[~haibo.chen] can you review the patch please?

Hi Rohith

Thanks for the patch. It looks like in YARN-6736, there are functions to check if  V1 (YarnConfiguration#timelineServiceV1Enabled) and V2  (YarnConfiguration#timelineServiceV2Enabled) are enabled but not for V 1.5.  

So I agree about adding timelineServiceV1_5Enabled. 

I am a bit unsure about the changes in TimelineClientImpl. It looks correct but are they required or would the earlier code be ok too?

Hi [~rohithsharma]

thanks for the latest patch! LGTM, pending two minor changes as suggested by checkstyle.

{code}
./hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-api/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/conf/YarnConfiguration.java:3792:  public static boolean timelineServiceV1_5Enabled(Configuration conf) {:25: Name 'timelineServiceV1_5Enabled' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'. [MethodName]
./hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/client/api/impl/TimelineClientImpl.java:85:  private boolean timelineServiceV1_5Enabled;:19: Name 'timelineServiceV1_5Enabled' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'. [MemberName]
{code}

I think we might want to rename the method and variable as per checkstyle suggestions.
Updated the patch fixing checkstyle issues.

Rohith and I discussed this and it looks like there is existing code which has similarly named method names for ATS v1.5 . But we also see code that does not have make use of the underscore in the function names for ats v1.5 and we decided to update the method names in this jira to remove the underscore character.
